4. District 2

District 2
==========

Kris Beard, Garland City Council District 2Kris Beard
-----------------------------------------------------

Phone: 214-418-9461

[Email Kris Beard](mailto:Council2@GarlandTX.gov)

[District 2 Map](https://maps.garlandtx.gov/cogmap/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=486148c0b0d1430c9b728f90a850b003&center=-96.621,32.906&level=14)

Biography
---------

District 2 Council Member Kris Beard was sworn in for her first term May 14, 2024.

Kris has a history of involvement in volunteer work, serving both her neighborhood and Garland as a whole. Her work with the Chandler Heights Neighborhood Association dates to 2010 and she served as the organization's president from 2012 to 2024.

A volunteer instructor in CPR and first aid for the American Red Cross from 1990-2011, Kris served in Garland's Community Emergency Response Team program. She is a graduate of Garland's citizen police and fire academies. She has more than 1,000 documented volunteer hours with the Garland Police Department and has served on the Citizen's Fire Academy board and its rehab team. Her graduation from the Garland Chamber of Commerce's Leadership Garland program comes nine days after joining the Council.

Professional Life
-----------------

Kris is retired after more than 20 years as a case manager for the Autism Treatment Center, where she served people with intellectual disabilities and/or congenital physical disabilities. She started her career as a psychologist at Terrell State Hospital.

She has a Bachelor of Arts in Psychology from the University of Texas at Tyler and is certified in Deaf-Blind Rehabilitation by the University of Illinois, in conjunction with the Helen Keller National Center. She is proficient in American Sign Language.

Personal Life
-------------

Married to Bobby Beard for more than 40 years, Kris is the mother of two adult children and grandmother of two boys. The Beards have been Garland residents since 1990.
